issue.title: Add a class to the "action" div in metadata form
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas Today, we cannot distinguish the "action" div in the html form generated by easySDI. ```
Contact pour le jeu de données
``` I would like to add a class to these div to overload the css and be able to hide some "action" div. Indeed some relations are repeated twice (cf screenshot). This class could be a slug of the relation label. The result should be : ```
Contact pour le jeu de données
``` What do you think about it. Or do you have an other trick?

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Hi Thomas !
I simply used the parent class, something like :
```

.inner-fds-sla-gmd-dp-MD_Metadata-sla-gmd-dp-distributionInfo .action {display:none;}
```
